contentrichtext.text: '''Yoshimoto''' may refer to: *[[Yoshimoto Kogyo]] - a major Japan entertainment company '''Yoshimoto''' is the given name of: *[[Banana Yoshimoto]] - pen name of Japanese writer Mahoko Yoshimoto *[[Hiroki Yoshimoto]] - Japanese race car driver. *[[Imagawa Yoshimoto]] - one of the leading daimyo (feudal lords) in the Sengoku period Japan *[[Nijō Yoshimoto]] - 14th-century Japanese poet *[[Takaaki Yoshimoto]] - Japanese poet, literary critic, and philosopher *[[Yoshimoto (musician)]] == See also == *[[Yoshimoto Cube]], a polyhedral mechanical puzzle toy invented in 1971 {{Disambig}}
